website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy rectangular sink that is both large and beautiful. Buyers should check carefully for cracks upon receiving this option, however.
pros: Comes in a variety of sizes, some with faucets included
Well-manufactured and very sturdy and heavy
Drains well and is easy to install
cons: Not perfectly square, which may cause some alignment issues
Some buyers report that this option arrives either broken or cracked

customer_reviews.title: Classic and well made!
customer_reviews.text: Was going for a rustic/industrial look for our bathroom. I made a bathroom counter out of a 4" slab of ambrosia maple with a 1" pipe base. The wood was too pretty to cut a huge hole in so opted for vessel sinks that sit on top. Purchased two of these...perfect!! Thanks to Prime, we got them in 2 days. They were packaged VERY well, most appreciated!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Ayers

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This this is perfect!! heavy duty. Came in the mail in one piece. So that's good. It feels like it's a good quality sink and looks really fancy. I don't have anything bad to say about this sink. Will post pictures of my project when done :)
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: We put two of these in our master bath. We needed to put a little caulk under each corner to keep it from rocking. Love the look and it drains better than similar sinks we purchased at a home improvement store. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: LuluStink

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Very easy to install. They get dirty quick. The dark color shows everything so you need to clean all the time. But i still love the way they look. I bought waterfall faucets to go with. One tip on the faucets, place them as close to the bowl as possible because there is a lot of splash back from the waterfall affect.
customer_reviews.author: Maria M

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking sink!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality Looking sink. We used this for my beach house remodel because I wanted a raised sink but didn’t want to use the typical round vessels. This was a clean look and much cheaper than my local big box store offered. Overall, happy with the finished product as shown in the pic. Can’t comment on the durability or if they stain as we haven’t stayed at the house long enough to See how it is after a long period of use.
customer_reviews.author: JV

customer_reviews.title: Big, roomy sink
customer_reviews.text: We recently remodeled our bathroom as I went with a black and white theme and wanted a white vessel sink. After looking at many on Amazon I decided to go with this one. I'm very pleased with it. It is big and roomy. I purchased the KRAUS Arlo Single Handle Vessel Bathroom Faucet in Matte Black to go with it and it came with a black pop-up drain that fits perfectly in the sink. Looks beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: B Lee

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant surprises
customer_reviews.text: I ordered just the SINK ONLY for $38, because I already had a faucet I wanted to install, and this came with its own faucet and drain, which weren't included in the product description so it was a pleasant surprise! I went ahead and used the drain provided, which is great because the stopper spins instead of popping up and down. The bottom of the sink gives plenty of space to adhere glue to when mounting it on a vanity. Overall, very pleased. Will be purchasing this sink again when I remodel my other bathroom!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY! It doesn't drain!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY! Don't be fooled by the reviews with nice pictures... Poorly designed, it does not drain! As nice as it might "look" this sink has a major design flaw that would make you regret it as you keep using it, it does not drain! The bottom of the sink is flat and keeps a permanent puddle of water! A total design failure for a product which main purpose is to drain water. Wasted hours of work, materials and money on this failure. It is shameful that not only I cannot get a refund, but have to lose hundreds more to have them removed, getting a proper sink and pay for new installation. AVOID!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me.
customer_reviews.text: Mine came well packaged and not damaged. No weird discoloration or cracks. Well will see how well it stands the test of time. This was is an exact copy of the Kraus brand vessel sink but half the price. So far worth a shot. I used the pop up drain by Kes and that fit perfectly and was easy to install. I was hesitant because of some of the bad reviews but gave it a shot since it was 1/2 the cost.
customer_reviews.author: denisebees

customer_reviews.title: Great vessal sink.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time very well packed, easy install and NO casting flaws that I could find. And it's cat approved...well Freddie Freckles likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Adams

customer_reviews.title: The pictures do NO JUSTICE, THE SINK IS GORGEOUS!
customer_reviews.text: This sink is GORGEOUS! Exactly what we were looking for in our Master Bath remodel. I was going for a clean, simple, farmhouse style and this is PERFECT! I feel like the picture makes it look smaller than it is, It's plenty big enough for a couple to share as opposed to having one for each person. I considered buying two, but after receiving it I am happy I am going with the one. It's quality made and heavy duty, a great value for the price. I would recommend this sink.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: A+ product, would buy again and probably will
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, I had to run a bead of caulk down the backside that you’ll never see because the sink was slightly off kilter but it wasn’t a huge deal at all. Looks awesome and I’m impressed with the quality for the price
customer_reviews.author: Brian D

customer_reviews.title: Buy it now!
customer_reviews.text: Love this sink! We get so many compliments on it from everyone! It was prime shipped, arrived in pristine condition, and who can beat this price. Will be buying another for our guest bath!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Looks fantastic, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Looks fantastic, easy to install, great price, and it works (hey, its just a sink). The hardest part is alignment, the shape isn't perfectly square making it hard to line up on the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Selkowitz

customer_reviews.title: perfect size! Bathroom isn't completely done lots of small ...
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what we were looking for!!!! perfect size! Bathroom isn't completely done lots of small things to do but on the way to being finished!
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and affordable
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. I converted a dresser in to a vanity and was having a hard time finding a sink to fit its 17” depth (that wouldn’t break the bank...). This sink is beautiful and for the price, you can’t get much better. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kenden Vanderburg

customer_reviews.title: Odd to love a sink, but these are pretty awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this sink. I ordered two of them to renovate my bathroom with, and did not realize that when I purchased them they sent faucets as well. I cannot speak regarding the faucets as we installed a different one. The sink it’s self is beautiful. I really like that the sides are sloped slightly and not completely vertical. Relatively easy to clean. Only downside is I think the finish around the drain is starting to wear which is a shame since the sinks have been used for barely a year. It’s only noticeable to me though as I clean them. We get nothing but compliments about these sinks. I would still purchase them again!
customer_reviews.author: Jewels41

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two of these Decided to return one almost immediately it was warped so bad I requested another one. However I started to install the other one and found the finish defective. I ordered black and they are white painted black I canceled the replacement which was approved but now screwed up because it’s shows me be allowed to return only one
customer_reviews.author: Joe R. Duncan

customer_reviews.title: This is a great looking sink
customer_reviews.text: This is a great looking sink. Love the height that it gives a vanity. Tip: Make sure your faucet is back far enough so that it doesn't hit the drain. This will help to avoid splashing.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: nice size
customer_reviews.text: We love this sink. It didn't work where we wanted it, but it was my measuring fail and not the product. It's heavy material, and very well manufactured. We are using it another room. I love the large size of it, so that I may be able to soak something.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn 4

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful looking sink
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars for a deformity when made on the back side where we installed the faucet. It's not straight but has a curve in it otherwise it would have been fine. Disappointed but we just installed it and we've had it in the box. My bad for not opening the box to inspect it, otherwise, I would have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: wildflowerz

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I like this vessel sink a lot. It's spacious enough so that you don't get splashing all over the place when you use it. It drains smoothly so nothing gets stranded to make water spots like our old vessel sink did. It's super easy to clean. Nice.
customer_reviews.author: Suetois

customer_reviews.title: Appeared to come used
customer_reviews.text: It arrived very dirty/grimey It was as though someone had messy contractor hands full of grout and was handling the item, definitely was not in new condition We already had it installed, my contractor was here and we couldn't wait for a replacement, but it it took me well over an hour with a magic eraser and goo gone
customer_reviews.author: User5

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't drain properly!
customer_reviews.text: The produced had amazing reviews so I went with it when I got it I opened it, it look great from the outside. However once it was installed i noticed it has little sag areas where water and debris ponds, I counted 4 areas. You can see in the pic where it doesnt drain properly. I have to constantly clean it and try to scoop the water and any little solids that remain there.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Maria Flores

customer_reviews.title: Great sink.
customer_reviews.text: Great size , comftorable to wash hand or face keeps all water inside the sink. Love the raised sink look. Will buy again for next bathroom remodel.
customer_reviews.author: Vadim

customer_reviews.title: Not a good shape
customer_reviews.text: Its nice enough but the water doesn't flow to the drain well despite being perfectly level. I will likely buy a smaller rounder one for better water flow. I have to clean it everytime I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Sirshrimp

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Finish with Dimples and Sand Speckles
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality porcelain finish. There was a large dimple with a black dot inside the bowl and what looks like sand particles throughout the porcelain finish. Also, the underside looked like it had been patched in several areas. Going to return.
customer_reviews.author: Cortney

customer_reviews.title: Nice basic vessel sink
customer_reviews.text: Nice basic style vessel sink. Construction is nice quality with no glaze runs. The sink was well packed so no issues with it getting damaged. The overall quality was pretty nice and this sink would look great in any bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Robotica Industries

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this sink with fingers crossed b/c the price was so good and we are not disappointed! It's heavy and plenty large for our workhorse bathroom for four people. Easy to clean and suits many styles. I've told friends that a vessel sink is the affordable way to go when DIYing a bathroom b/c you can get a quality product for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: K. F. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great value with one disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation and looks great but have a disappointment. The sink is missing a coating or film on the interior surface that would minimize water spotting; the sink always looks dirty as a result of all the spots.
customer_reviews.author: BoandTug

customer_reviews.title: Uneven around the drain.
customer_reviews.text: The sink looks great, but after installing it I noticed the water pools away from the drain. The counter and the sink have been leveled. I felt the sink base and there is a small ridge around the drain preventing all of the water from going down.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Laumeyer

customer_reviews.title: Love the Look, Hate the Stain
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this unique matte black sink. Finally was able to install but immediately upon use found that the uneven surface leaves an ugly stain cause by standing water. Wish I could do something about it but it seems like a defect ...Update..black paint has now completely rubbed off of the surface from the standing water in the uneven surface. Looks terrible.
customer_reviews.author: C. M.

customer_reviews.title: Great except is doesn’t drain correctly.
customer_reviews.text: This sink is gorgeous. The black is terrible pain to keep clean, but I still love it. Unfortunately, ours holds water to the right of the drain in a perfect kidney bean shape. Even when completely dry, the place that holds water tends to have a bean-shaped ring where the water sat. I still think it’s a great value and really pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Jones

customer_reviews.title: KES is really doing great work
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it...although, water spots all over and seemingly permanent.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Farmhouse Sink
customer_reviews.text: Love this farmhouse sink, which was perfect for the farmhouse vanity I built! Packaged well, delivered timely, and easy to install. Looks great and it's easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Heddy J.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value. Quality and Price
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Cute. Perfect for our farmhouse style bathroom make over. Packaged well. Damage free
customer_reviews.author: TRAcy Shrum

customer_reviews.title: Just want I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my new home being built and I was super impressed with the packaging!! I live in Hawaii so was a bit worried the sinks would crack during transit...I ordered 3....but they came perfectly intact with no damaged! Will edit review once installed!
customer_reviews.author: THG

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional!
customer_reviews.text: Very good moressed! Very solid! Seems very high dollar yet it was super affordable! Very happy with these sinks! Bought 2! Will purchase again for guest bath remodel! Pix isn’t the greatest...still remodeling so vanity is sitting in bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Severt

customer_reviews.title: Defective Drain- Design Flaw
customer_reviews.text: Although this sink is beautiful, it has difficulty draining the water. The drain is a manufacturer defect and needs to be redesigned for sure. Also, it is impossible to keep clean from every day use. I do not recommend this sink, unless you have a live in housekeeper to clean it after every use.
customer_reviews.author: shawn

customer_reviews.title: Look nice but check for cracks
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two of these for our bathroom remodel - unfortunately one came with a small crack/hole in the corner where water is now leaking. We didnt inspect them thoroughly until they were being installed and now it's too late to return. In retrospect I regret not paying a little more for a higher quality sink.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Moscuzza

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves this, super easy to install! Granite guy was happy he only had to cut a 4" hole in the slab.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Loving it
customer_reviews.text: Cool look. Not too heavy. Solid and great matte finish.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install rectangle sink
customer_reviews.text: The sink is very functional and beautiful . We got a lot of compliments on how it looks.
customer_reviews.author: TVILLAN !

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and great value.
customer_reviews.text: These sinks are top notch. They look very expensive. We had some issues getting the plumbing to fit but this really wasn’t an issue because of the sink, just the fact is was going in an old bathroom that was remodeled.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Planned Remodel Choice
customer_reviews.text: Bought in advance for a bathroom remodel and is exactly what we need. Plan to pair it with a lighted waterfall faucet.
customer_reviews.author: Dolomite149

customer_reviews.title: Used sink
customer_reviews.text: What I unboxed was a used sink with silicone around the bottom rim and a cracked drain area.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and roomy
customer_reviews.text: I like the style of these sinks M<ake sure you order a popup drain as they are not supplied with the sink.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect just what I needed! Can’t wait to buy another fit my other bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: GENEVA JERNIGAN

customer_reviews.title: Quality affordable expensive looking
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 sinks and used them for 2 bathrooms. Sinks are very good quality with no issues at all. They look expensive and made my bathrooms look like from some designer's magazine.
customer_reviews.author: Indira Kafadarevic

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical because of the price but these sinks came looking great! So happy I got them
customer_reviews.author: Andrea E.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sink! Put a little caulk under each corner for support! Cleans up great! It’s beautiful!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Quality was great and looks beautiful. Would definitely purchase again, we bought these for master bath remodel.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle J McKay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the sink, we are remodeling the guest bath and bought two of them. Water drains nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Nice sink
customer_reviews.text: This sink is really nice. It is a wonderful addition to my bathroom remodel. It's bigger than it looks in the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: kristain A.

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: It is heavy, so I imagine that relates to the quality in some way. It looks great. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Quality Sink
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality product and would recommend to all. Looks great and is true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. V

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality sink for the price. Much thicker and sturdier than I was expecting. Would buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: This is a good deal. Nice quality vessel sink for a good price

customer_reviews.title: Great sink
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sinks with a large basin. We get complements everytime somebody comes over.

customer_reviews.title: Nice size and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, looks good and I like the size.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Jantzer

customer_reviews.title: Great product! So beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this sink! Packaged well and has performed just as I wanted. The price can not be beat. I’m considering the same for our master bath now.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Rubin

customer_reviews.title: The look of my bathroom it's much much better with this ware and the price it's even better ...
customer_reviews.text: The look of my bathroom it's much much better with this ware and the price it's even better I like it 👍
customer_reviews.author: ISAAC.......G

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Great sink. I used in my farmhouse style bath, it looks wonderful and looks and functions as well as ones I have spent 2-3 x more....
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Hendrickson

customer_reviews.title: Good looking sink. Had to modify though.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these. One I had no problems with, the other had a hunk of hardened sealant to close a manufacturing hole that I had to chisel away in order for the sink to sit flush.
customer_reviews.author: Sustainable Mike

customer_reviews.title: Bathroom Sinks.
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful sink that we will put 2 in our new bathroom
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: It's a little taller thani expected but I love it!
customer_reviews.text: We are loving our new sink! It's a little taller thani expected but I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Angie Lollar

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is solid and great for the price. Fits well on my homemade vanity.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Bolin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This sink worked beautifully for our vanity. Absolutely love it. Super fast shipping. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Jan Davis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for an item that I've seen priced for twice the amount.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Pirillo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really love this sink, We had vessels sinks before and these are so much better
customer_reviews.author: CrazyforAZ

customer_reviews.title: We love this sink
customer_reviews.text: We love this sink. It compliments our countertop perfectly. It is very large so be sure to measure and know how thick the sides are.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Light

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sink! Modern look and clean. i remodeled a bathroom abs installed these with no regrets. They add character to an otherwise boring double vanity. They are also reasonably priced compared to other similar sinks.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Looks exactly like the high dollar sinks
customer_reviews.text: Top notch! Looks exactly like the high dollar sinks. Bought one.. then bought 2 more. Quality is great! 1 came cracked but had no problem returning at no cost
customer_reviews.author: Ronjon

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Five stars all the way! Easy to install, great product.

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous sink. We redid our half bath and it came out perfect.

customer_reviews.title: High quality,beautiful sinks!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these sinks to replace 2 old oval drop in's. I was pleasantly surprised when they arrived. Packaged very nicely in high quality foam. These sinks are substantial and beautiful!

customer_reviews.title: Broken upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: The sink was broken when it arrived. Now my project is delayed.

customer_reviews.text: This sink was exactly what I was looking for and a really good value for the money.

customer_reviews.text: Had a crack in the sink and put this right over the top to make it the vessel look and we love it.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for all bathrooms
customer_reviews.text: I love the size and quality of the bowl. It's perfect for all bathrooms.

customer_reviews.text: Very nice and good quality just like it looks on the picture, i have not install it yet 👍recommend product

customer_reviews.text: We bought one for each bathroom and love the size, shape and look. Easy to clean and modern. Great price.

customer_reviews.text: I had a good experience with this product and with the vendor. The first one was delivered on Monday and had a minor blemish. Ups picked it up on Tuesday and the new one was delivered on Wednesday. I am very satisfied with my new sink, looks great and great customer service. Thank you

product_meta.title: KES Bathroom Vessel Sink 19-Inch White Rectangle Above Counter Countertop Porcelain Ceramic Bowl Vanity Sink, BVS110
feature_bullets: SQUARE VESSEL SINK: 18 63/64 x 14 41/64 x 5 23/64 inches (482 x 372 x 136 mm). Depth of bowl: 4 1/8 inches. Standard 1.75" drain opening.

PREMIUM GLAZE: This bathroom sink has a smooth, non-porous surface with a baked-on glaze for added durability and a high-gloss finish. Simply wipe the sink surface with a damp cloth to keep it looking beautiful with minimal maintenance.
TOP MOUNT INSTALLATION: Vanity sink with no faucet hole, no overflow. Designed to work with both counter and wall-mounted vessel faucets.
RECTANGULAR VESSEL: This sink features a symmetrical, deep basin and rounded edges. Comes into a whole sink bowl, no seams, non-leakage.

CUSHIONING PACKAGE: Sink is packed in strong corrugated cardboard box with extra-thick foam on all sides, preventing shock and vibration. Please inspect the sink before installation to make sure it has not been cracked or chipped during transit.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars289 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
